//This is the Card which display the Product Image , Name ,Price 
import React from'react';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(_ref){var product=_ref.product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{className:"card-image",src:product.images[0].image1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"p",className:"name-label",style:{background:'black',fontSize:'15px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",style:{color:'green',fontSize:'15px'},children:["Rs ",product.Cost.price]})]})]})})});};export default Product;

sourcesContent: //This is the Card which display the Product Image , Name ,Price import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( <> {product.name} Rs {product.Cost.price} ) } export default Product
